Subjects: Robert of Bury, saint; prayers, to saints
_description: A prayer to St Robert to help the monastery — eighteen couplets

BLEge3143.First Lines:
Hayle cheftane cristes aghen confessourAls seruaunt of our
                    sauiour…
BLEge3143.Last Lines:
…Wyth the to wonne In endles blysseRyght wys Roberd prey for
                    þis. Amen
BLEge3143.Editions:
Haslewood,  Joseph,
                        ed.  
             The Metrical Life of Saint Robert of Knaresborough.
         London: A. J. Valpy, 1824: 55-6.
Bazire,  Joyce,
                        ed.  
             The Metrical Life of St. Robert of Knaresborough, together with the
